attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want our roads fixed, we pay lots of money to drive our cars and its not acceptable!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to fix our roads.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=FIX-OUR-ROADS


Her Majesty's Government
